history.proof: intros f. induction f using Formula_depth_ind2. - simpl. auto. - simpl. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHf1. rewrite IHf2. auto. - simpl. rewrite IHf. auto. - simpl. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language
M: Model

Goal:
forall f : Formula L, freeVarFormula L f = freeVarFormula L (nnHelp f)

Premises:
Inductive Formula (L : Language) : Set := equal : Term L -> Term L -> Formula L | atomic : forall r : Relations L, Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> Formula L | impH : Formula L -> Formula L -> Formula L | notH : Formula L -> Formula L | forallH : nat -> Formula L -> Formula L Arguments forallH _ _%nat_scope
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, Formula L -> list nat
nnHelp = fix nnHelp (f : Formula L) : Formula L := match f with | @equal _ t s => equal L t s | @atomic _ r ts => atomic L r ts | @impH _ A B => impH L (nnHelp A) (nnHelp B) | @notH _ A => notH L (nnHelp A) | @forallH _ v A => forallH L v (notH L (notH L (nnHelp A))) end : Formula L -> Formula L
nnTranslate = fun f : Formula L => notH L (notH L (nnHelp f)) : Formula L -> Formula L
subFormulaExist : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (existH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then existH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then existH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s) else existH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
subFormulaForall : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (x v : nat) (s : Term L), let nv := newVar (v :: freeVarTerm L s ++ freeVarFormula L f) in substituteFormula L (forallH L x f) v s = (if Nat.eq_dec x v then forallH L x f else if in_dec Nat.eq_dec x (freeVarTerm L s) then forallH L nv (substituteFormula L (substituteFormula L f x (var L nv)) v s) else forallH L x (substituteFormula L f v s))
Formula_depth_rec2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, P a
Formula_depth_ind2 : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall f4 : Formula L, P f4
Formula_depth_rec2rec : forall (L : Language) (P : Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : Term L, P (equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (atomic L r t)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> forall f0 : Formula L, P f0 -> P (impH L f f0)) -> (forall f : Formula L, P f -> P (notH L f)) -> (forall (v : nat) (a : Formula L), (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b (forallH L v a) -> P b) -> P (forallH L v a)) -> forall a : Formula L, (forall b : Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> P b) -> P a
substituteFormulaNotNice : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaNot L f z1 q = substituteFormulaNot L f z2 q
Formula_depth_rec2_not : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f...
Formula_depth_rec2rec_nice : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f...
In_freeVarListFormulaE : forall (L : Language) (v : nat) (F : Formulas L), In v (freeVarListFormula L F) -> exists f : Formula L, In v (freeVarFormula L f) /\ In f F
Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3 f...
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : Term L, Q (equal L t t0) -> P (equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (atomic L r t) -> P (atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (impH L f f0) -> P (impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g, (forall q : Q g, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : Q (impH L f g), f3...
substituteFormulaImpNice : forall (L : Language) (f g : Formula L) (z1 z2 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}), (forall q : nat * Term L, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}, (forall q : nat * Term L, z3 q = z4 q) -> forall q : nat * Term L, substituteFormulaImp L f z1 g z3 q = substituteFormulaImp L f z2 g z4 q
subFormulaId : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat), substituteFormula L f v (var L v) = f
subFormulaDepth : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), depth L (substituteFormula L f v s) = depth L f
language_decideable = fun L : Language => ((forall x y : Functions L, {x = y} + {x <> y}) * (forall x y : Relations L, {x = y} + {x <> y}))%type : Language -> Set
model : forall U : Set, (forall f : Functions L, naryFunc U (arity L (inr f))) -> (forall r : Relations L, naryRel U (arity L (inl r))) -> Model
Record Model : Type := model { U : Set; func : forall f : Functions L, naryFunc U (arity L (inr f)); rel : forall r : Relations L, naryRel U (arity L (inl r)) } Arguments model _%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
substituteFormulaImp : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L), (nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L f}) -> forall g : Formula L, (nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L g}) -> nat * Term L -> {y : Formula L | depth L y = depth L (impH L f g)}
subInterpFormula1 : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f -> interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s)
subInterpFormula : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f < -> interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s)
subInterpFormula2 : forall (value : nat -> U M) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), interpFormula value (substituteFormula L f v s) -> interpFormula (updateValue value v (interpTerm value s)) f
subFormulaNot : forall (L : Language) (f : Formula L) (v : nat) (s : Term L), substituteFormula L (notH L f) v s = notH L (substituteFormula L f v s)
System = fun L : Language => Ensemble (Formula L) : Language -> Type
Formulas = fun L : Language => list (Formula L) : Language -> Set

```coq
intros f.
induction f using Formula_depth_ind2.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHf1. rewrite IHf2. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHf. auto.
- simpl. rewrite IHf. auto.
Qed.
```
